alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 4:51AM PST until March 06 at 2:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow and strong west winds, mostly falling late this afternoon and evening. Plan on snow and ice covered roads tonight. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are expected. * WHERE...Above 4500 feet. * WHEN...Until 2 AM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
